abstract: Vanessa Friedman examines decision by Louis Vuitton to stage haute fashion show in Ro de Janeiro, despite numerous and diverse problems Brazil is currently facing.
lead_paragraph: The fashion house flew in celebrities and some of its best customers for an elaborate show in an embattled Brazil.

headline.main: Louis Vuitton Makes a Statement, Fashion and Political, in Rio

snippet: The fashion house flew in celebrities and some of its best customers for an elaborate show in an embattled Brazil.
